name: TV Thief
description:
Do you like stealth games with beautiful graphics? If yes, then TV Thief is for you! In this game you will be a TV thief and you will need to steal all the TVs from the houses. The residents of this house can prevent you from doing this. Don't get caught in their eyes!

In TV Thief you have to play as a character who steals TVs. You will need to take the TV out of the house and load it into your van. Stealing TVs will not be easy at all, as there are residents in the houses. If you catch their eye, you will certainly go to jail. Take out the TVs without too much attention!

Game Features:
Stylish and beautiful graphics!
Funny music!
Intuitive interface!
Cool and interesting gameplay!
